abstract: Gov. Rick Perry is expanding his tight circle of Texas advisers to adapt to the growing needs - and to deal with the growing pains - of his Republican presidential candidacy.
snippet: Gov. Rick Perry is expanding his tight circle of Texas advisers to adapt to the growing needs - and to deal with the growing pains - of his Republican presidential candidacy.
lead_paragraph: Read the complete report on Monday's changes to Rick Perry's campaign strategy.

headline.main: Perry Adds Veteran Advisers to Campaign
